text: Sergei Ivanovich Shmatk√≥ (26 September 1966 - 7 November 2021) was a Russian businessman and politician. He was Russia's Minister of Energy from May 2008 until May 2012. Shmatko died on 7 November 2021, from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Russia in Moscow, aged 55. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian politicians Category:Russian businesspeople Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:People from Stavropol Krai
title: Sergei Shmatko
